function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of the virus through airborne aerosols and droplets on various surfaces","Impact":"Increase in the risk of infection due to prolonged virus stability on surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of surfaces, especially those in hospitals and public places","Technologies":"Ultraviolet (UV) disinfection, chemical disinfectants, antimicrobial coatings","People":"General public, hospital staff, visitors to public places","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Survival of the virus on different surfaces for extended periods","Impact":"Risk of transmission and infection through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough disinfection of commonly touched surfaces, use of antimicrobial materials, implementation of hand hygiene practices","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, self-disinfecting surfaces, hand hygiene stations","People":"Public, hospital staff, cleaning personnel","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities, manufacturers of antimicrobial products"},{"Description":"Influence of environmental conditions and surface temperature on virus activity","Impact":"Increased virus activity in colder environments and on colder surfaces","Mitigation":"Monitoring and control of indoor environmental conditions, implementation of temperature control measures, and use of heating systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems, temperature sensors, building automation systems","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
